sources.title: Father Came Too!
sources.description: Title: Father Came Too! Summary: A young married couple experience difficulties doing up a cottage, and are hindered by the wife's father. Directed by: Peter Graham Scott Actors: James Robertson Justice, Leslie Phillips, Stanley Baxter Production Company: Independent Artists Release Date: 31 August 1964 (Sweden) Aspect Ratio: 1.66 : 1 A young married couple experience difficulties doing up a cottage, and are hindered by the wife's father.

metadata.Plot: A young married couple experience difficulties doing up a cottage, and are hindered by the wife's father.
metadata.Actors: James Robertson Justice, Leslie Phillips, Stanley Baxter
